item.title: What’s new: Sentinel Solution for SAP BTP
item.description:
Introduction
In today's digital landscape, low-code development platforms have become increasingly popular among businesses looking to accelerate their application development processes. However, with the convenience and speed that these platforms offer, there are also security risks that organizations must consider.
SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP) is a cloud-based solution that provides a wide range of tools and services for developers to build, run, and manage applications. One of the key features of SAP BTP is its low-code development capabilities. Low-code development allows dev...
